text: tama deviyange ayavan samudiranaya kara penvanu læbu vita, eva pratiksepa kara, tama atvalin karana lada væradi (sampurnayenma) amataka kara damannata vada aparadhakaruva kavarekda? ovun kisivak dæna noganna lesa api ovunge hrdayanhi tirayakda, ovunge kanvalata bihiribhavayada niyata vasayenma æti kalemu. ebævin (nabiye!) oba ovunva rju margayehi (kopamana bægæpatva) aradhana kala vuvada, kisi kalekat ovun rju margayata ennema næta
